content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, Mister Schmidt, I'm a student and I'm on a tight budget. I was thinking about 300 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my asking price. I'm looking to get at least 500 euros per month for the apartment. It's a prime location with all the amenities you could need. Would you be willing to pay that much?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too much for me. I can offer 400 euros per month. I hope that you understand my situation as a student.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you're a student and may have budget constraints, but 400 euros is still below my asking price. I'm willing to give you a student discount, but I can't go below 450 euros per month. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for the discount, Mister Schmidt. I really appreciate it. I'll take it. I agree to the price of 450 euros per month!
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that, Maryam. The apartment will be perfect for a student like you. It's close to the university and all the necessary facilities. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
